name: Celestius
description:
!!! HOW TO PLAY !!!

Use WASD or arrow keys to move,

To use boost, while moving in a direction, press left shift,

E to close console,

E to repair ship when you've collected ship pieces.

Made in 3 days for fun! :)

Celestius is a Tiny Metroidvania game, where you have to recover pieces to your ship to find your way home.

Update v1.0.2

-Added Post Processing

-Added stars and planets in the background
